page.title: 12HALIFAX Building Society.
page.content: 1.Where was your first branch opened in Aberystwyth?{It was in 5 Terrace {Road.}2.How long have you been here? {Since June 1966.}3.Why did you choose to come here?{There was an oppurtunity {to do bussiness.}4.How wide spread is your society in Wales?{There are 25 {branches.}5.Is this spot very busy? { {Yes,because it is a main road.}6.In your opinion where is the best spot for a building society?{Here,because {it is busy.}7.Do you sponser any companies?{No.}8.Why do you think there are so many societies in Aberystwyth?{Because Aberystwyth is {the biggest town for approx.50 miles.} 9.Do you have any competition from other societies?{Yes.}10.Whats the largest amount of money you have kept? {Â£136,000.}11.Has your building society made an Alliance with another?{No.}
